Package WYSIWYM.util

Class Summary
Dotter Dotter creates a dot-representation of the semantic graph, so it can be drawn with GraphViz
HelpSession This class contains the instances of all help sessions of one user
LiberSession This class contains the instances of one user session
ProperDirSelector Deprecated. Used for testing
UserInfo Deprecated. Only used for usability evaluation
 

Exception Summary
BadAnchorException This exception is thrown when an anchor without relations is created
BadDateException This exception is thrown when a unwelldefined date is created, or an error is encountered when trying to generate a NL expression for this date
FolksonomyException This exception is thrown when there is an error in getting tag clouds or storing tags.
HelpException This exception is thrown when the wrong list is accessed in a help session
OntologyInputException This exception is thrown when there is an error reading the ontology.
SesameException This exception is thrown when something to do with Sesame throws an Exception
SPARQLException This exception is thrown when there is an error in the creation or execution of a SPARQL query
SurfaceRealisationException This exception is thrown when an error occurs in Surface Realisation
TextPlanningException This exception is thrown when an error happens in the text planning.
UndoException This exception is thrown when an anchor without relations is created
